name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】『Connect Addict』✨3rd Anniversary Live【#獅白ぼたん3周年】 [dsH4DXtSpqk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Connect Addict' with Hakui Koyori.
Performance of the song 'Connect Addict' with AZKi.
Instrumental intro for the next song.
Performance of the song '蒼き炎' (Aoki Honoo) with Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: Jump up your brave
subtitles.english: Jump up your brave

subtitles.original: Pass in the sky
subtitles.english: Pass in the sky

subtitles.original: It's about of sensation
subtitles.english: It's about of sensation

subtitles.original: Connect Addict
subtitles.english: Connect Addict

subtitles.original: 作詞/作曲: DAIKI TSUNETA 編曲: MELRAW
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: DAIKI TSUNETA Arrangement: MELRAW

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 誰も知らない 名も無い暇を駆けて行くの
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, I'm passing through an unknown, nameless moment

subtitles.original: あの三日月へ手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out for that crescent moon

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 君を知りたい 声にならない臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, I want to know you, through the timid morning that remains unspoken

subtitles.original: 例え何度変えようとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I change it

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai

subtitles.original: ペースの合致とパチンと着慣れたその時
subtitles.english: When our paces match and click perfectly into place

subtitles.original: 世界と育んでしまったみたいだ
subtitles.english: It feels like I've nurtured a bond with the world

subtitles.original: 目に映る景色が悲しく笑うな
subtitles.english: The scenery reflected in my eyes is laughing sadly

subtitles.original: 恐れず瞼を閉じてごらん
subtitles.english: Try closing your eyes without fear

subtitles.original: さあ皆さんこちらへどうぞ 鼓動の鳴る方へさ
subtitles.english: Now everyone, please come this way, towards the sound of the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさ
subtitles.english: Tap your heels, please, towards where the heart dances

subtitles.original: 蜃気楼に飛び乗って 逆さまの世界乗りこなして
subtitles.english: Jump on a mirage and master this upside-down world

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 止まない愛を知りたいと願うお呪い
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, a charm wishing to know an unending love

subtitles.original: 時を超えて 朝から夜まで
subtitles.english: Across time, from morning until night

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 君を知りたい 何一つ見逃さぬように
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, I want to know you, so that I don't miss a single thing

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないのを
subtitles.english: Knowing that time waits for no one

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が 抗えぬ宿命が
subtitles.english: A cruel fate, an unavoidable destiny

subtitles.original: 考える間もなく 足音鳴らして
subtitles.english: Making footsteps without even a moment to think

subtitles.original: 前が見えなくたって 君を信じてみたいの
subtitles.english: Even if I can't see ahead, I want to try believing in you

subtitles.original: 恐れずに一歩踏み出したら
subtitles.english: If you take a step forward without fear

subtitles.original: さあ皆さんこちらへどうぞ 鼓動の鳴る方へさ
subtitles.english: Now everyone, please come this way, towards the sound of the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさ
subtitles.english: Tap your heels, please, towards where the heart dances

subtitles.original: さあ皆さんこちらへどうぞ 鼓動の鳴る方へさ
subtitles.english: Now everyone, please come this way, towards the sound of the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 踵打ち鳴らせどうぞ 心の踊る方へさ
subtitles.english: Tap your heels, please, towards where the heart dances

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶ鯨に飛び乗って 逆さまの世界踊り尽くせ
subtitles.english: Jump on a flying whale and dance through this upside-down world

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 誰も知らない 名も無い暇を駆けて行くの
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, I'm passing through an unknown, nameless moment

subtitles.original: あの三日月へ手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out for that crescent moon

subtitles.original: ラララライ ラララライ 君を知りたい 声にならない臆病な朝を
subtitles.english: Lalalalai lalalalai, I want to know you, through the timid morning that remains unspoken

subtitles.original: 例え何度変えようとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I change it

subtitles.original: 夢ならば覚めないで 現実なんてさ身も蓋もないから
subtitles.english: If it's a dream, don't wake up, because reality is so blunt

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないのを
subtitles.english: Knowing that time waits for no one

subtitles.original: 蒼き炎
subtitles.english: Aoki Honoo

subtitles.original: 作詞: 高橋洋子 作曲: 大森俊之
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Takahashi Yoko, Composition: Omori Toshiyuki

subtitles.original: 年光を灯すすれば 儚い眠り
subtitles.english: If the years of light are lit, a fleeting sleep

subtitles.original: Schiarvest が
subtitles.english: Schiarvest will...

subtitles.original: 気付き彷徨い踏み出した 確かな忍び合いを
subtitles.english: Realizing, wandering, taking a step into a certain bond

subtitles.original: Schiarvest が
subtitles.english: Schiarvest will...

subtitles.original: あぁ その背中は
subtitles.english: Ah, that back...

subtitles.original: 羽をもぎ取られた跡がある
subtitles.english: ...has marks where the wings were torn off

subtitles.original: 小さな何かを信じて もう一度掴もう
subtitles.english: Believing in something small, seize it once more

subtitles.original: 赤く燃える鼓動の火花 痛みそして揺れる
subtitles.english: The red sparks of a burning heartbeat, the pain, and then it wavers

subtitles.original: Schiarvest が
subtitles.english: Schiarvest will...

subtitles.original: 拙い火を切り裂き 立ち笑うため高く
subtitles.english: Cutting through the clumsy fire to stand and laugh high

subtitles.original: Schiarvest が
subtitles.english: Schiarvest will...

subtitles.original: 誇りを持ち合い 振り上げ
subtitles.english: Holding pride together and raising it up

subtitles.original: 私の中で
subtitles.english: Inside me

subtitles.original: あなたの中で
subtitles.english: Inside you

subtitles.original: 闇を切り裂くしているの
subtitles.english: It's cutting through the darkness

subtitles.original: No, そわない
subtitles.english: No, it won't yield

subtitles.original: No, 希望なんだせめて
subtitles.english: No, it's hope, at least
